Consider 

\[A=\left[\begin{{matrix}}
a_{{11}} & a_{{12}} \\
a_{{21}} & a_{{22}} \\
\end{{matrix}}\right]
\]

where

<table style="border-collapse: collapse; width: 100%; display: inline-table; border: 10" border="5" >
    <colgroup>
      <col style="width: 50%">
      <col style="width: 50%;">
    </colgroup>
    <tbody>
      <tr>
        <td>\(a_{{11}}\) = {a11}</td>
        <td>\(a_{{12}}\) = {a12}</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td>\(a_{{21}}\) = {a21}</td>
        <td>\(a_{{22}}\) = {a22}</td>
      </tr>
    </tbody>
  </table>

So \(det(A)\) = {d} and  \(Ax=b\) is a system {solucaounica}.
